summary: While being on the run for saving a mouse, the famous Puss in Boots, Pero, helps a young peasant boy win the heart of a lovely princess, while trying to rescue her from an evil wizard.
cast: Susumu Ishikawa|Toshiko Fujita|Rumi Sakakibara|Asao Koike|Kin'ya Aikawa|Isamu Tanonaka|Ado Mizumori|Kazuo Kumakura|Yoko Mizugaki|Kenji Utsumi|Shun Yashiro|Kiiton Masuda|Peter Fernandez|Jack Grimes|Gilbert Mack|Masako Nozawa|Corinne Orr|Ray Owens|Billie Lou Watt
keywords: puss in boots|sword and sorcery|sword and fantasy|surrealism|anime
title: El gato con botas
